biography: The daughter of actors Ronald Lacey (Raiders of the Lost Ark) and Mela White (Bergerac), Rebbeca Lacey is a British actress best known for her performances as the ditzy Hilary in the sitcom May to December, and as Dr Georgina 'George' Woodman in Casualty. Her films have included Carry on Columbus, Heavy Weather, Arthur's Dyke and Chalet Girl.
name: Rebecca Lacey
